agent: Good morning, Welcome to Rivertown Customer Care Service. How may I be of help to you?
I'm fine as well. How may I help you?
customer: I don't seem to remember my password.

agent: You want to reset your password right?
Kindly provide your details for identification ma'am.
Your first name?
Is it spelt as M.A.R.I.A.H?
customer: No, It is spelt as M.A.R.I.A.

agent: Can I have your last name ma'am?
Is it spelt as C.L.A.R.K.E?
What's your date of birth ma'am?
customer: May Twenty Eight Nineteen Ninety Two.

agent: Wow! It's a pleasure sharing the same date with you.
Your Phone number?
Eight Zero Two.
Nine Five One.
Please reconfirm your phone number, Eight Zero Two Nine Five One Four Eight Nine Zero.
Your Social Security Number.
Nine Seven Two.
Five Four Six.
The last two digits are incorrect ma'am. Please reconfirm.

agent: Oh! That's fine ma'am.
customer: the last three digits are Zero Seven Seven.

agent: Just a minute ma'am. I'm with you.
customer: Alright. Can I also change my insurance plan?

agent: Yes ma'am. I can help you with it but let me sort this out first.
The answer to your Security Question.
customer: that's where the problem lies. I can't seem to remember my security question.

agent: I can help you change your security question. We have a range of questions you can pick from.
customer: whoa! Please kindly help me out with it.

agent: Kindly pick the question you can easily remember ma'am.
Your mother's maiden name, your childhood best friend name, Your first pet name, your high school name, your favourite teacher's name.

agent: I'm so sorry for your loss ma'am.
So your new security question is the name of your first pet and your security answer is Jayden right?
I'll need your functional email address ma'am.
customer: maria carter at gmail dot com.

agent: A password reset link will be sent to your mail. Please kindly click on the link to reset your password.
You want me to help you change your insurance plan?

agent: Is there any other thing you would love me to help you out with?

agent: Enjoy the rest of the day ma'am.
